# ImageRouter.io - AI Image Generation Platform

ImageRouter.io is a unified platform that provides access to 80+ AI image generation models through a single, OpenAI-compatible API. Developers can integrate multiple AI art generators into their applications without changing code, using a pay-as-you-go pricing model with no subscriptions.

## Documentation

### API Documentation
- **URL**: https://docs.imagerouter.io/
- **Description**: Comprehensive API documentation covering authentication, endpoints, model parameters, and integration examples for all supported AI image generation models.

### Developer Integration Guide
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/#developer-friendly
- **Description**: Code examples and integration guides for popular programming languages including Python, JavaScript, Java, C++, Rust, and Go with ready-to-use code snippets.

## Products & Services

### Main Platform
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/
- **Description**: Landing page showcasing the core service - access to 80+ AI image models through one unified API with OpenAI compatibility, no subscription fees, and pay-as-you-go pricing.

### Pricing Information
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/#pricing
- **Description**: Detailed pricing structure with free tier options, pay-as-you-go model starting from $0.001 per image, and enterprise plans. No minimums or hidden fees.

### Model Catalog
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/models
- **Description**: Comprehensive catalog of 80+ supported AI image generation models including Stable Diffusion, SDXL, Kandinsky, and more with usage examples.

## Tools & Integrations

### Background Removal Tool
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/tools/background-removal
- **Description**: Specialized tool for removing backgrounds from images using AI with simple API integration.

### SVG Vector Generation
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/tools/vector-generation
- **Description**: AI-powered tool for converting images to SVG vector graphics with scalable output for design applications.

### Open WebUI Plugin
- **URL**: https://docs.imagerouter.io/integrations/open-webui-plugin
- **Description**: Plugin for integrating ImageRouter.io with Open WebUI for local AI model management and interface.

## Policies

### Terms of Service
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/terms
- **Description**: Legal terms governing the use of ImageRouter.io services including user responsibilities, service limitations, and liability disclaimers.

### Privacy Policy
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/privacy
- **Description**: Privacy policy detailing data collection, usage, storage practices, and user rights regarding personal information and generated content.

## Support

### Frequently Asked Questions
- **URL**: https://imagerouter.io/#faq
- **Description**: Answers to common questions about API compatibility, model availability, pricing, security, integrations, and support options.

### Community Support
- **URL**: https://discord.gg/imagerouter
- **Description**: Community Discord server for developer support, feature requests, and peer-to-peer assistance with integrations.
